entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
